description: Welcome to the highly sought-after Winchester — the largest home in the complex, offering nearly 2,300 sq ft of living space with 4 spacious bedrooms and 3½ bathrooms, all within walking distance to top-rated schools, shopping, and the recreation centre. The main floor features an open-concept layout with vaulted ceilings leading to a TOTALLY PRIVATE covered patio. kitchen with white shaker cabinets, SS appliances and a convenient 2-piece powder room. Upstairs offers generous bedrooms, while the fully finished lower level includes a bedroom, 4-piece bath, family room opening to a covered patio with privacy wall leading to a fully private fenced yard plus two bonus storage rooms. Double side-by-side garage. Well maintained, hardly lived in, contact for a private viewing.
